mapper.select: select deviceinfo.terminal_id as id,tel_num as tel,location,islinked as state,battery,voltage,workstate,date from deviceinfo left join terminal_dev on deviceinfo.terminal_id = terminal_dev.terminal_id WHERE DATE = (select max(date) - FLOOR(RAND()*7) from deviceinfo)

select deviceinfo.terminal_id as id,tel_num as tel,location,islinked as state,battery,voltage,workstate,date from deviceinfo left join terminal_dev on deviceinfo.terminal_id = terminal_dev.terminal_id WHERE DATE = (select max(date) from deviceinfo) and deviceinfo.terminal_id = #{id}
